title: Constant Crashing 4.17-4.18
body:
I've been experiencing a series of crashes whenever a game starts whenever the loading screen starts (no its not my toaster, this is a recent thing) I have no idea whats wrong it just puts me at game crashed and I reconnect and the whole thing crashes again. I got the warning about leaver buster even though it was all just "crashes"
I swear if I get banned I'm probably just going to leave league if I can't even play it anymore no matter what {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Have you tried repairing your installation? That usually fix most of the common problems.

> Have you tried repairing your installation? That usually fix most of the common problems.

LMAO. YEA BECAUSE THATS EVERYONES ISSUE RIGHT NOW.

Holy shit, you riot people are so damn blind.

I'm sorry but everyone is having this problem right now since 4.17. It's from Riot, not the people. Have anyone from Riot even look at the "Help & Support" section? People been screaming about this problem/bug for days now and no one is acknowledging us.

> Have you tried repairing your installation? That usually fix most of the common problems.

do Rioters even read other topics? this is an extremely prevalent issue around the forums that has been occurring for days.  

I know it's your job to assume we're all stupid and that the problem is our fault, but it's client side. Repairing the installer does NOTHING.

just saying; wow I didn't know rito employees were bullied like this. I know its not your fault your just trying to help, and that riot is using the rito dollars to fix these problems. 

How would I repair the installation? I'm not computer savvy but I'm just reading I should re install league pretty much. Correct me if I'm wrong though.
*Edit* I also heard ya'll were establishing new servers, is this apart of the problem?

It's been a serious problem.

It's not my internet or on my end for sure. I've tested everything while it has been going on and everything leads to it being server-sided.

I can't say how everyone else is affected, but mine starts with a lag between going from champion select to the loading screen. After which, every 2-5 minutes in the game it continuously gives me the "Attempting to Reconnect" message and I cannot move or use skills, however, I can see things going on in the game just fine as if it's not lagging.

For example, I can see people moving correctly and using skills, warding, ect. Which when I have lagged in the past, it either continues the other players down their clicked path or stop moving period and you can't see them use skills or ward.

The other funny thing is that this issue only occurs for that specific game. Afterwards it doesn't persist and only affects 1 out of every 5-7 games or so. So it's very jumpy and why I think it may be a faulty server or something.

Same damn things happened to me, but I DC about 4-8 times during the game, every 2 minutes... this just so annoying I'm wondering whether I should stop playing league of legends.

Last time I lagged out, I smashed my mouse, because this just unfixable and piss me off sooooooooo much.

Yeah... I don't mean to be rude, but this is really dumb. It makes me feel like I, as a Mac user am not really appreciated as a player of the game. PC bugs get fixed relatively quickly, and I realize that one reason for that is b/c PCs are easier to meddle around with than Macs are, but thats not a cry good excuse for a game like League of Legends with such a large community. I can definitely attest to the fact that this bug has only been occurring as of Patch 4.17, and it has not really been improved in Patch 4.18, even though it was mentioned in the patch notes, and I have read a thread posted by a Riot Engineer who personally worked on fixing the bug, who explained very clearly what the bug was. But still, that is the only thing I have seen from Riot acknowledging this issue, and it have been almost three weeks since it first started happening. I don't even get Loss Prevented on games because Riot won't acknowledge this, and it happens often enough in one game to completely throw the game, even my team is really far ahead. I wouldn't even mind if Riot took another week or so to fully address the bug, as long as they acknowledged it and took measures to compensate for it. Maybe a notification in the patcher, or not raising my LeaveBuster level because I keep crashing, or preventing players from all reporting me because I disconnected six times over the course of a 35 minute game. So PLEASE, PLEASE do something about this, even just posting a link to a thread where we can all talk to the Riot Engineers. One thing that I actually think would be really cool would be  a livestream from the Riot Engineers, even just for an hour or so, to kinda see what they are doing to fix this, if anything.
I have been bugging out ever since 4.17 on a windows 8. Every 3 minutes I get a 500 ping. Haven't been able to play ranked for several months.

Yeah no really. Patch 4.18 hasn't done anything noticeable towards fixing these crashes for me. I've decided I'm just not going to play anymore until I hear good news from other mac users.
I crash /every single game./ This has never happened before. It takes AT LEAST 7 tries to reconnect, and I'm likely to just crash again. So why bother playing? Worlds is over, so can we please turn our focus to helping the mac people out? ;-;
omg now i know im not the only one

Are you kidding me, it's like 3-5 times every single game for me, it's frustrating because it usually gives the enemy a kill and at least sets me back in cs by like 10 every single time.  Sometimes this bug even lets the enemy win teamfights because I randomly dc'ed. My game runs flawlessly at 60 fps and low ping, but these disconnects happen at random. 
Note: I have Windows not Mac.

I fixed this by getting another player to send me their complete RADS/projects folder.
It's a pain and will take a long time but it'll work.

yep still happening when will this bug get fixed its getting annoying getting screwed over because of this dcing then having to close game and reopen. then having a team-mate bitch because you left for like 1-3 mins
Just played a game. Bugged out at the 2 minute mark. Had to restart my computer. GOT IN YAY! Only to bug out every 1-2 minute. Totally probably more than 10 bug outs during the entire game. Fix pls?
